attributes.tags: blackberry juice concentrate beverage izze pepsi
attributes.description: Since Izze rejected my request for "proprietary information," I have had to source more general variations using brands for in common stores.
attributes.title: Izze Sparkling Blackberry

attributes.description: Izze is bottled by Pepsi. Pepsi has many bottling plants throughout the east coast.
attributes.title: Pepsi Bottling Plant

attributes.description: Spicy World Brand of citric acid is packaged and distributed out of Houston, TX. Spicy World Citric Acid is sold on Amazon.
attributes.title: Spicy World Citric Acid
Driscoll's Blackberries, Raspberries
attributes.description: Watsonville, Oxnard, and Santa Maria are places in California Driscoll's blackberries are grown. Driscoll's blackberries are sold at Kings Soopers and Safeway.

attributes.title: Driscoll's Blackberries, Raspberries
attributes.address: Zapotecas 177, Tolteca, Álvaro Obregón, 01150 Mexico City, Federal District, Mexico
attributes.description: Jocotepec, Los Reyes, Tapalpa, and Zamora are all cities in Central Mexico where Driscoll's blackberries are grown. Driscoll's blackberries are sold at Kings Soopers and Safeway.

attributes.title: Driscoll's Blackberries
attributes.description: Burlington, WA, and Sandy, OR are both places Driscoll's Blackberries are grown. Driscoll's blackberries are sold at Kings Soopers and Safeway.

attributes.title: San Pellegrino Water
attributes.description: San Pellegrino sparkling water is sold at Kings Soopers and Safeway.
